name: vsts-developer-tools
description: Visual Studio Team Services Extension Developer Tools

scripts.initdev: npm run initdev:npm  && npm run initdev:typings
scripts.build:web: npm run clean && npm run build:web:noclean
scripts.build:web:noclean: npm run compile:web && npm run content:web && npm run content:extension:web
scripts.package:web: tfx extension create --root dist --output-path dist --manifest-globs vss-extension-web.json
scripts.prelink:tasks: mkdirp dist/_temp/node_modules && pushd "dist/_temp" && npm install vsts-task-lib && popd
scripts.build:tasks: npm run clean && npm run build:tasks:noclean
scripts.build:tasks:noclean: npm run compile:tasks && npm run content:tasks && npm run content:extension:tasks  && npm run link:tasks && npm run link:tasks:publish
scripts.package:tasks: tfx extension create --root dist --output-path dist --manifest-globs vss-extension-build-tasks.json
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build:web:noclean && npm run build:tasks:noclean
scripts.package:all: npm run package:tasks && npm run package:web

author: Microsoft Corporation
